resources.string:
When no character is selected, the randomizer randomly selects one maniac from all characters, as well as random skills and ability enhancements for him.

When one character is selected, then random skills and ability enhancements The randomizer selects specifically for the selected maniac.

When two or more characters are selected, the randomizer randomly selects one maniac from the selected characters, as well as random skills and ability improvements for him.

If you click on the skill icon, it will be excluded from the selection of the randomizer.

To return the skill to the selection of the randomizer, click on the icon again.

To start the randomizer, click on the button in the form of a dice.

See you in the fog!

When no character is selected, the randomizer randomly selects one survivor from all characters, as well as random skills for him.

When one character is selected, the randomizer selects random skills specifically for the selected survivor.

When two or more characters are selected, the randomizer randomly selects one survivor from the selected characters, as well as random skills for him.

If click on the skill icon, then it will be excluded from the selection of the randomizer.

To return the skill to the selection of the randomizer, click on the icon again.

To start the randomizer, click on the button in the form of a dice.

See you in the fog!
An error occurred while loading data. Make sure the player has a public Steam profile and plays DBD then try again.
